amendatorysection.catchline: Meetings; when held; virtual conferencing authorized.
amendatorysection.para: Meetings of the members of the authority shall be held at least once every three months to attend to the business of the authority and may be held at the call of the chairperson or whenever any five members so request. Such meetings shall at all times be subject to the Open Meetings Act, and such meetings may be held by means of virtual conferencing in accordance with subsection (2) of section 84-1411.
